text.headline: III Desaf&iacuteo La Morra
text.text:
Mini Desafío La Morra,recorrerá parte del recorrido de la carrera principal

Prueba de aproximadamente 16,0 km y 800 m de desnivel positivo, subiendo al Pico de Majadillas con 1.329 metros.

text.headline: Ultra Sanabria by Stages
text.text: This was the time I started off with the DataCamp's Data Scientist Career Track. It had nearly 22 modules which I took 2 months to complete
